channel.title: USA Immigration
channel.description: So guys, whatd you think of the Prez's immigration plan?

item.title: USA Immigration
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

I think they would go through legally if the whole citizenship process didn;t take so fucking long you know what i mean guys?

Read full topic

item.title: USA Immigration
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I feel that the immigration is a necessary evil. Without it the economy of the United States would be in tatters, and the population would be decreasing at an alarming rate. What the immigrants have done is man the jobs that nobody else would willingly take and help repopulate this country.

The reason nobody is taking those jobs is because companies don’t have to pay illegal immigrants as much, or give them healthcare, so they make the benifits such that nobody in their right mind would take the jobs, hence the only people who work it are illegals. They are the reason there are jobs Americans won’t do, so using that as an excuse for their continued presence here doesn’t make sense.

Read full topic

item.title: USA Immigration
item.dc:creator: @mop mop
item.description:
@mop wrote:

Sounds like a problem we got in australia only we got asians… and we cant gun em down
Then we got lebanese walking round with guns (Guns arent legal in Australia unless you have a license) who are just shooting shit, my dad works at a resturant and his afraid to get out from the office coz theres always fights and his afraid of a drive by soon, but then again i guess his a pussie coz u guys are all big tough Americans -.-

item.title: USA Immigration
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

PaulT:

It’s a shit plan. It uses only 2% of our national guard and they don’t even use their weapons unless acting in personal self defence. They are their for two weeks, one week to observe one week to advise. Then a new group of guardsman come in for two weeks. The governers have complete control over the troops, but many politicians are bending to the illegals to get re-elected. Even Arnold himself, govenator of California, is probably going to use the troops in a pussy half-ass way, to get votes from the democrats.

I agree. It’s a crock of shit.

Read full topic

item.title: USA Immigration
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:3, topic:3105”]I demand a Gaza-style wall along the U.S side of the Rio Grande, only with .50cal machine gun emplacements. Anyone who makes it past is granted immediate honorary citizenship because they’re obviously more deserving than whatever lazy, stupid fatass whose job they’re going to “steal” - not that it matters of course, because a randomly selected lazy, stupid fatass from a government (Census Bureau) list will swap places with the new citizen to make room for our new, super-ass-kicking, bullet-dodging Mexican brother

Er…actually I didn’t listen because I assumed whatever he said would have shit all to do with what he actually does, but I bet my idea is better anyway.[/quote]

That is actually a very good plan. I too voted “I hate Mexicans”, but were that an option it would have received my vote instead.

Read full topic
